raw_body: JAYAMANNA – PREMA (Ex-employee of Ceylon Theatres Ltd and No. 2 employee of State Film Corporation) – Beloved wife of Max,​ loving mother of Ruwan and Suneth,​ grandmother of Zosia,​ mother-in-law of Anna,​ daughter of Sinhala film pioneers,​ late BAW Jayamanne and Grace,​ sister of late Sweenitha,​ Mallika and late Gamini,​ sister-in-law of Ananda Munasinghe,​ late Dr. K.C. Fernando and Kanthi Jayamanne. Her remains lie at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour (‘Restpect’) Borella,​ from 8.30 a.m. to 8.00 p.m. on Sunday 16th July and from 8.00 a.m. to 2.30 p.m. on Monday 17th July. The cortege will leave the parlour at 3.30 p.m. after a religious service at 2.30 p.m. for cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4 p.m. (Old Crematorium).044018
